comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/tavanophotography] McDonalds was much better back then! They say that before, it was actually made of real stuff and was much better quality- of course. Yeah, it sucks not many people care nowadays- and if it won't get better, imagine how life's gonna be in about 20 years! And I'm only 11! That's not good!

comment.author: 62729790@N02
comment._content: Well I am about 30+ years older than you, and yes, Mc Donald's food was much better back then. You are wise beyond your years...best of luck to you in all you do :)

comment.author: 60135285@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/62729790@N02] Haha! Thanks! You're pretty wise too! And now, maybe there's a tiny light in my mind telling me that the future might not be too bad- maybe it'll be cleaner? Who knows? I wish luck to you too! :D
